helpCenter.accountDeleteAnswer: Go to Settings > Account > Delete Account. This action is permanent and cannot be undone.
helpCenter.accountDeleteQuestion: How do I delete my account?
helpCenter.appNotWorkingAnswer: Try restarting the app, check your internet connection, update to the latest version, or contact support.
helpCenter.appNotWorkingQuestion: The app is not working properly, what should I do?
helpCenter.contactFormMissingInfoToastDescription: Please fill in all required fields
helpCenter.contactFormSuccessToastDescription: We'll get back to you as soon as possible
helpCenter.helpCenterDescription: Find answers to common questions or contact our support team
helpCenter.howMatchingWorksAnswer: Our algorithm considers your preferences, location, interests, and activity to show you compatible profiles.
helpCenter.howMatchingWorksQuestion: How does the matching system work?
helpCenter.howToAddPhotosAnswer: Go to your profile settings, tap 'Add Photos', select from your gallery or take new photos. You can add up to 6 photos.
helpCenter.howToAddPhotosQuestion: How do I add photos to my profile?
helpCenter.howToBlockUserAnswer: Go to their profile, tap the three dots menu, and select 'Block'. They won't be able to see or contact you.
helpCenter.howToCancelSubscriptionAnswer: Go to Settings > Subscription to cancel. You can also cancel through your app store subscription settings.
helpCenter.howToCancelSubscriptionQuestion: How can I cancel my subscription?
helpCenter.howToCreateProfileAnswer: To create a profile, sign up with your email, add photos, write a bio, and verify your account for better matches.
helpCenter.howToCreateProfileQuestion: How do I create a profile?
helpCenter.howToReportUserAnswer: On their profile, tap the three dots menu and select 'Report'. Choose the reason and provide details.
helpCenter.howToReportUserQuestion: How do I report a user?
helpCenter.howToVerifyProfileAnswer: Go to profile settings and follow the verification process. Take a selfie matching the pose shown to get verified.
helpCenter.howToVerifyProfileQuestion: How do I verify my profile?
helpCenter.messagePlaceholder: Describe your issue or question in detail...
helpCenter.notReceivingNotificationsAnswer: Check your device settings, ensure notifications are enabled for the app, and verify your notification preferences.
helpCenter.notReceivingNotificationsQuestion: I'm not receiving notifications, how to fix this?
helpCenter.quickAccessChatDescription: Chat with our support team in real-time
helpCenter.quickAccessEmailDescription: Send us an email for detailed support
helpCenter.refundPolicyAnswer: Refunds are handled according to app store policies. Contact support for assistance with refund requests.
helpCenter.safetyTipsAnswer: Always meet in public places, tell friends your plans, trust your instincts, and never share personal information early.
helpCenter.safetyTipsQuestion: What are the safety tips for dating?
helpCenter.subjectPlaceholder: What can we help you with?
helpCenter.whatIsPremiumAnswer: Premium includes unlimited likes, super likes, profile boosts, advanced filters, read receipts, and ad-free browsing.
helpCenter.whatIsPremiumQuestion: What features are included in Premium?

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using 2Sweety. By using our service, you agree to these terms.

quickOverview.title: Quick Overview
quickOverview.description: These Terms of Service govern your use of 2Sweety, a dating platform that connects people worldwide. By creating an account, you agree to follow our community guidelines and use our service responsibly.

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.paragraph1: By accessing or using 2Sweety, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.
section1.paragraph2: We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use of our service after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

section2.title: 2. Eligibility Requirements
items: Have the legal capacity to enter into these terms
Not be prohibited from using our service under applicable laws
Not have been previously banned from our platform
section2.ageVerificationDesc: We may request age verification documentation to ensure compliance with this requirement.

section3.title: 3. Account Responsibilities
section3.intro: When creating and maintaining your account, you agree to:
allowedItems: Use recent, accurate photos of yourself

section4.title: 4. Privacy and Data Protection
section4.intro: Your privacy is important to us. We collect and process your data in accordance with our Privacy Policy and applicable data protection laws.
section4.dataSecurityDesc: We use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your information.
section4.yourRightsDesc: You have the right to access, modify, or delete your personal data at any time.

section5.title: 5. Premium Services and Payments
section5.intro: 2Sweety offers premium features through subscription plans. By purchasing a premium subscription:
items: You agree to pay the specified fees
Refunds are subject to our refund policy
Premium features are subject to availability
section5.cancellationDesc: You can cancel your subscription at any time. The cancellation will take effect at the end of your current billing period.

section6.title: 6. Account Termination
section6.intro: Either party may terminate your account:

section7.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
section7.intro: 2Sweety provides the service "as is" and makes no warranties regarding:
items: Compatibility or success in finding matches
section7.safetyDesc: While we strive to provide a safe environment, users are responsible for their own safety when meeting others.

section8.title: 8. Governing Law and Disputes
section8.paragraph1: These terms are governed by the laws of Sweden. Any disputes will be resolved in the courts of Stockholm, Sweden.
section8.disputeDesc: We encourage resolving disputes through our customer support before legal proceedings.

section9.title: 9. Changes to These Terms
section9.paragraph1: We may update these Terms of Service to reflect changes in our service or legal requirements. We will notify users of significant changes through the app or email.
section9.paragraph2: Your continued use of 2Sweety after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

contact.title: Questions About These Terms?
contact.description: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is our priority. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

overview.title: Privacy at a Glance
overview.description: At 2Sweety, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal data. This policy complies with GDPR and other international privacy regulations.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.intro: We collect information to provide you with the best dating experience while maintaining your privacy and security.

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.intro: We use your information for the following purposes:
section2.serviceDesc: Creating matches, enabling communication, and personalizing your experience
section2.securityDesc: Preventing fraud, ensuring safety, and maintaining community standards
section2.improvementDesc: Analytics, research, and developing new features
section2.communicationDesc: Sending notifications, updates, and customer support

section3.title: 3. Information Sharing and Disclosure
section3.intro: We never sell your personal information. We may share your information only in the following limited circumstances:
items: With Other Users: Profile information you choose to display publicly
Service Providers: Trusted partners who help us operate our service
Legal Requirements: When required by law or to protect our rights
Business Transfers: In case of merger or acquisition (with notice)
section3.neverShareDesc: Your private messages, financial information, or precise location data with third parties for marketing purposes.

section4.title: 4. Data Security Measures
section4.intro: We implement comprehensive security measures to protect your data:

section5.title: 5. Your Privacy Rights
section5.intro: Under GDPR, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:
section5.accessDesc: Request copies of your personal data
section5.portabilityDesc: Export your data in readable format
section5.exerciseDesc: Contact privacy@2sweety.com or use the settings in your app to exercise these rights.

section6.title: 6. Data Retention
section6.intro: We retain your data only as long as necessary for the purposes outlined in this policy:

section7.title: 7. Cookies and Tracking
section7.intro: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience:
section7.essentialDesc: Required for basic app functionality and security
section7.analyticsDesc: Help us understand how you use our service (with consent)
section7.manageDesc: You can manage cookie preferences in your browser settings or through our privacy settings.

contact.title: Data Protection Officer
contact.description: Our Data Protection Officer is available to help with privacy-related questions
contact.availability: Response within 72 hours ‚Ä¢ GDPR Compliant ‚Ä¢ Multi-language support
